attributes.action: End the antiquated practice of entitling MPs to the title "honourable member".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition to end the antiquated practice of entitling individuals representing political parties in parliament to be addressed as "honorable member of parliament".  Similarly, those ministers appointed members of the privy council to work for political parties should no longer be addressed as "right honorable member of parliament".  
It has become a contradiction in terms.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
